isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - WHEELS, RIMS AND TIRES - TIRE CARE - INFLATION

svcproc.title: INFLATION
svcproc.para: Tire pressures should be checked at regular and frequent intervals and the pressures maintained to specifications. Use an accurate tire pressure gauge and check when tires are cool.
Over-inflated or under-inflated tires will reduce the service life of the tire.
Never "bleed" (remove) air from hot tires. The pressure will be reduced but an increase in temperature will result as soon as driving continues.
